meanings.definition: A portable case designed to hold a traveler's clothing and personal belongings.
meanings.sent1: I packed my clothes in the suitcase for our trip.
meanings.sent2: The suitcase was heavy with all my belongings inside.
meanings.sent3: The suitcase looked like a tiny closet on wheels.
meanings.sent4: Her suitcase was a treasure chest of memories from her travels.
meanings.sent5: The bright red suitcase stood out among the sea of black bags at the airport.

meanings.definition: To pack or transport items in a suitcase.
meanings.sent1: I will suitcase my clothes before we leave.
meanings.sent2: She suitcases her belongings neatly to avoid wrinkles.
meanings.sent3: He decided to suitcase his entire wardrobe for the move.
meanings.sent4: They suitcase their essentials for the weekend getaway.
meanings.sent5: Remember to suitcase your toiletries in a separate bag for easy access.
